Description: Allowed limited operations for retail/dining under capacity and mitigation rules; staggered by region.
Primary Mobility Impact: Gradual return of discretionary travel under strict caps; regionally differentiated pace.

Description: Mandated masks in indoor public spaces, aligned with VDH guidance.
Primary Mobility Impact: Reduced close-contact risk in indoor commercial/transit environments.

Description: Broader reopening with restrictions; gatherings up to 250; continued operational/mitigation standards.
Primary Mobility Impact: Commuting/consumer and cross-city travel expanded under rules; large events still constrained.

Description: New measures as cases rose: reduce social gathering cap to 25, expand mask requirements, late-evening restrictions.
Primary Mobility Impact: Suppressed large gatherings and nightlife mobility; reduced indoor transmission risk.

Description: Instituted a midnight–5 a.m. stay-at-home requirement, 10-person social cap, and broader mask requirements.
Primary Mobility Impact: Reduced late-night/holiday mobility and gatherings; braking transmission during winter surge.
